attributes.review: I downloaded this app to educate myself on the orange, but it doesn’t work. It’s slow and takes literally forever to download. Not worth the time. Also, Trump is disgusting. Thank you for your time

I have no idea how this misogynistic, homophobic, sexist, racist, garbage human is able to put such filth on the AppStore. It is spreading hate and further trying to spread his horrible agenda. I don’t care if you’re  a democrat or a republican, this does NOT belong on the AppStore.
attributes.title: This app does not belong on the App Store.

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hopes of getting news about Trump. It seemed as though all the news was fake and the app kept glitching. maybe next time don’t try donald 💕

-sincerely,
      gen z
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: Not only did this app take 2 months to download but it also played the song replay every time I opened it. I would not recommend this app to anyone not even an enemy.

attributes.review: This is the worst app, not only did it take FOREVER to download but once I tried to get on it, the app crashed my phone and I had to turn it off and I download it.... needs major work

attributes.review: this app is actually honestly really bad i was gonna do the spam thing then i opened it and the amount of times it kicked me out was INSANE, please fix this like if ur gonna make an app at least make it good❤️

attributes.review: i tried to open the app however it just kept closing the setup its ✨ d i s g u s t i n g ✨ and honestly, it’s a nuisance and apple should be embarrassed to even have this in the store. i also read a review saying that it’ll deliver pizza to your home once you get the app and within 20-40 minutes of having the app there was no pizza, you can see how that upsets me as a long time pizza eater and fan.😾
